mistral:7b-instruct: This EPO plan from HIF with a monthly premium of $300 offers comprehensive coverage for your medical conditions including hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care, which is vital given your health profile. With a high maximum coverage of $500,000 and reasonable out-of-pocket limits ($6500), this plan provides substantial financial protection while remaining affordable for an upper-middle income bracket individual like yourself.
